awd_titl_txt: International Travel Award to attend VIII International     Conference on Chemistry for Protection of the Environment,  September 16-20, 1991, in Lublin, Poland
awd_abstract_narration: This is an award to provide a support for the                                   investigator's participation in the Eighth International                        Conference on Chemistry for Protection of the Environment                       that will be held in Lublin, Poland from September 16-20,                       1991.  The investigator will chair a technical session,                         present an invited paper and participate in an                                  International Roundtable discussion of issues addressed by                      the conference including pollution prevention, waste                            minimization, advanced physicochemical treatment of water                       and wastes, fate of chemical pollutants in the                                  environment, and advances in tracking pollutant diffusion                       and dispersion in surface and groundwater under                                 environmental stress.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
